data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tselikh, Ekaterina (2015): Review of the world species of Spaniopus Walker, 1833 (Hymenoptera: Pteromalidae), with description of a new species from the Russian Far East. Zootaxa 4058 (1): 41-65, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.1.2
